title: North End Apartment - Available 9/1 with NO FEE!
posting_body: ['Available 9/1 - NO Broker Fee!', 'Located on Sheafe Street - amazing walkable location in Boston\'s "Little Italy."', 'Enjoy a 100/100 walk score.', 'Close walking distance to the Financial District, Quincy Market, Faneuil Hall, the Waterfront, and more!', 'Endless dining and entertainment options just steps away from home!', 'Apartment Features:', '- 1 Bed, 1 Bath', '- Available 9/1', '- Hardwood Floors', '- Washer/Dryer IN-UNIT', '- Exposed Brick', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Dishwasher/Disposal', '- New dishwasher (not shown in photos)', '- Cat friendly!', "First month's rent, last months' rent, and $100 key fee.", 'Contact us to schedule your showing today!', 'No security deposit, and NO FEE (savings of $200/month on a 12 month lease term!)', 'Ask us for a link to the video on file!', 'NO SMOKING, MUST HAVE GOOD CREDIT']
